nodes.bodyText: Seeing this is matching DATE you should derive it from DATE even if that's storing it in a constant.

Good to see the use of constants, but that sure is a lot. Keep in mind you only need them if you're using a value more than once. Also, for a big block like this best to sort them, and if they're related group them into (sorted) blocks. (A good example of this was just trying to find RADIO2 after I'd already found RADIO1.
Be worthwhile in this case to add JavaDoc to the class which has a link off to the GitHub issue.
